person.name: Manoj Barhpagga
person.summary: Motivated full-stack developer and instructor with hands-on experience building web applications using the MERN stack, designing course content, and developing institute-grade automation tools. Comfortable delivering both production features and teaching technical concepts to students.

highlights.title: Full-Stack Web Development (MERN)
highlights.description: Built production-ready websites and admin dashboards using React, Node.js, Express and MongoDB. Experience deploying to Vercel and other hosting platforms.

highlights.title: Education & Training
highlights.description: Created and delivered curriculum for C, C++, Python, JavaScript and Web Development to institute students.

highlights.title: Exam & Certificate Automation
highlights.description: Designed modules for online exams, automatic evaluation and certificate generation within institute systems.

experience.title: Website Programmer & Teacher
responsibilities: Design and maintain institute website and student/teacher dashboards.
Develop backend features: authentication, exams, certificate generation, APIs.
Create teaching content and conduct programming classes (C, C++, Python, JavaScript).
Implement integrations for reports and basic automation.
achievements: Built exam evaluation and certificate export module (implemented inside institute platform).

experience.title: Freelance / Client Projects
responsibilities: Delivered small-to-medium web projects for local clients (landing pages, admin panels).
Handled basic hosting and deployment for clients on Vercel/Netlify.

projects.name: SkillUp Institute Website
projects.description: Primary website for SkillUp Institute including student/teacher dashboards, exam modules, and certificate generation.
features: Online exam system with answer evaluation
Automatic certificate generation for final exams
Admin controls for content and user management

projects.name: Staff Management App (Design)
projects.description: Planned staff management application for assigning tasks, tracking progress and attendance — includes IP-based login concept for location control.
features: Admin dashboard for monitoring staff activity

projects.name: Online Attendance System (onlineattendance-two)
projects.description: Attendance web app used for institute student attendance management (demo/production depending on deployment).

education.details: Subjects included Physics, Mathematics and Computer Science. Passed with 69% (as stated in original CV).
Final year student (previous semester score noted as 83% in source).

certifications.title: HTML, CSS & JavaScript for Web Developers

achievements.title: Course & Curriculum Development
achievements.description: Prepared teaching material and exercises for programming courses (C, C++, Python, JavaScript and Web Development).

achievements.title: Platform Features Delivered
achievements.description: Implemented exam automation and certificate generation inside institute management system.

schemas.notes: Each project contains id, slug, url, repo, role, period, techStack, description, features, screenshots (array).
